mapper.select: SELECT auth_permission.* FROM auth_role_permission_r INNER JOIN auth_permission ON auth_permission.PERMISSION_ID=auth_role_permission_r.PERMISSION_ID WHERE auth_role_permission_r.ROLE_ID=#{userId}

SELECT auth_permission.* FROM (SELECT PERMISSION_ID FROM auth_user_role_r INNER JOIN auth_role_permission_r ON auth_role_permission_r.ROLE_ID=auth_user_role_r.ROLE_ID WHERE auth_user_role_r.USER_ID=#{userId}) a INNER JOIN auth_permission ON auth_permission.PERMISSION_ID=a.PERMISSION_ID GROUP BY PERMISSION_ID
